attributes.additional_details: This is a call for parliament to vote on a early general election to end this chaotic governments death grip on the nation. They are further widening the rich poor divide, and tanking the pound! They are reckless with our economy and our way of life.
attributes.background: This is a call for parliament to vote on a early general election.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
